title: mkl watch (Unreleased)
summary: Mokaal Watchface for Android Wear devices
description: The mkl watch is a set of watchfaces designed with simplicity and elegance in mind. All faces come with beautiful linear animations as well as a choice in fonts and 24 or 12 hour modes.Future versions will be able to update with new watch faces directly from the app.You can suggest future faces in https://plus.google.com/+MokaalDev
descriptionHTML:
The mkl watch is a set of watchfaces designed with simplicity and elegance in mind. All faces come with beautiful linear animations as well as a choice in fonts and 24 or 12 hour modes.

Future versions will be able to update with new watch faces directly from the app.

You can suggest future faces in https://plus.google.com/+MokaalDev
